dialogue.text: Woah, hold on a second there!!
You have no profiles, buddy! How do you expect\nto play with your own save data if you don't\neven have any to begin with?
Let's fix that, though. I have a couple options\nfor you.
You can either play as a guest, meaning you\ndon't have to make a profile right away, or...
I can help you set up your profile right now!
So, what do you want to do?
